item.title: The GOP
item.description: I bet ten bucks on a sentimental favorite to win. Sure, he’s old, and reports say he didn’t train as hard as he might have. But he’s been my boxing hero since childhood—when he won the gold at the Olympics. I’m sure there’s another moment of glory waiting to explode on an unsuspecting world. He just needs to land that one magical right. As the rounds wear on, though, I can feel it.

item.title: How to Explain the Uselessness of Teachers’ Unions
item.description: America’s coolest governor explains it all: [youtube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ksLlAi3iIc&color1;=0xb1b1b1&color2;=0xd0d0d0&hl;=en_US&feature;=player_embedded&fs;=1&hl;=en]
